channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Don’t steal the revelation
item.description: Learning is a journey of incompetence. First, we realize that there’s something we don’t know. Then we see that we’re going to be better at it, and we...

item.title: Trusting AI
item.description: For generations, humans have been entrusting their lives to computers. Air Traffic Control, statistical analysis of bridge resilience, bar codes for d...

item.title: 2020’s Most Gorgeous Driving Game Gets Sequel With ‘Over The Hill’
item.description: The superb 'Art of Rally' finally gets a spiritual successor in 'Over the Hill', which takes the relaxed, cozy experience off road.

item.title: Inside Stargate’s AI Reality Distortion Field
item.description: The details of Stargate Project involve a collision of money, politics, and egos—with many potential conflicts down the road.

item.title: New Samsung Feature Will Change How You Use Your Galaxy Phone
item.description: Bixby isn't dead, it has a surprise new job.

item.title: How LilyEve Is Bringing Sustainability To Luxury
item.description: Each jacket, coat, and accessory is handcrafted from pre-loved materials sourced from luxury brands like Hermes and Gucci.

item.title: Kinds of incompetence
item.description: The second worst is the unaware sort. The work doesn’t meet spec, and we don’t even realize it. The worst is uncaring. We know the work doesn’t meet s...

item.title: Honesty about better
item.description: “I don’t want to learn to be better,” is something we rarely admit. We don’t say: I don’t want to learn statistics, even though it will dramatically i...

item.title: Lulled
item.description: Selfish is easy. Short term is easy. Complacent is easy. Turning our head and ignoring the problem is easy. Going along to get along is easy. But easy...

item.title: FBI Agents’ Call And Text Logs Potentially Stolen In Data Breach
item.description: FBI Agents' call and text logs may have been stolen in a data breach—could expose anonymous informants.
